byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Mark Mazzetti, Eric Schmitt, Michael S. Schmidt and Max Fisher.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN, MATTHEW ROSENBERG, MATT APUZZO and GLENN THRUSH

lead_paragraph: Mr. Flynn, who served in the job for less than a month, said he had given “incomplete information” about a telephone call with the Russian ambassador before President Trump’s inauguration.
snippet: Mr. Flynn, who served in the job for less than a month, said he had given “incomplete information” about a telephone call with the Russian ambassador before President Trump’s inauguration....

headline.main: Michael Flynn Resigns as National Security Adviser
headline.print_headline: Facing Scrutiny Over Russia Call, Flynn Steps Down
